q1.question: Who was first Indian leader to resist?
q1.recall: There were several Indian leaders who played significant roles in resisting British colonial rule in India. One of the earliest leaders to actively resist British rule was Rani Lakshmibai of Jhansi, also known as the Rani of Jhansi. She led an armed rebellion against the British during the Indian Rebellion of 1857, also known as the First War of Independence. Rani Lakshmibai's resistance and bravery made her a prominent figure in the fight against British colonialism in India.
q1.vectordb:
The document does not mention the name of the first Indian leader to resist.
SOURCES:
q1.hybrid: There were several Indian leaders who played significant roles in resisting British colonial rule in India. One of the earliest leaders to actively resist British rule was Rani Lakshmibai of Jhansi, also known as the Rani of Jhansi. She led an armed rebellion against the British during the Indian Rebellion of 1857, also known as the First War of Independence. Rani Lakshmibai's resistance and bravery made her a prominent figure in the fight against British colonialism in India.

q2.question: Who does Sebastian want to make a film about?
q2.recall: Sebastian wants to make a film about Christopher Columbus's first voyage to the New World, the imposition of Columbus's will upon the natives, and the subsequent indigenous rebellion.
q2.vectordb: Sebastian wants to make a film about Christopher Columbus's first voyage to the New World, the imposition of Columbus's will upon the natives, and the subsequent indigenous rebellion.
q2.hybrid: Sebastian wants to make a film about Christopher Columbus's first voyage to the New World, the imposition of Columbus's will upon the natives, and the subsequent indigenous rebellion.
